title: broke LoL player here
body: im looking foward to this game, every saturday my friends get together to play mtg/board games/lan parties and i really want to start this up with them. but im hard pressed for cash, will there back up stock for this or is it a limmited production thing?

replies.body: they will keep producing this until everyone who wants a copy has one. They made clear that this is important to them
Just save up, I guess... I'm doing that..
sweet, thanks, was worried rent would be late this month
